function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to the entry of infected individuals into the clinic","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading disease to other patients and healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict entry control measures, including temperature checks and anamnesis forms","Technologies":"Automated temperature screening systems, digital anamnesis forms","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, clinic staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Possibility of undetected contagious individuals entering the vaccination process","Impact":"Risk of exposing vulnerable individuals to infection during the inoculation phase","Mitigation":"Enhance the anamnesis process to accurately identify high-risk individuals, provide separate areas for high-risk patients","Technologies":"Advanced anamnesis forms, segregation of high-risk patients","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, clinic staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Potential for transmission of disease during the waiting period post-inoculation","Impact":"Risk of infected individuals spreading diseases to others while waiting for side effects","Mitigation":"Implement strict monitoring and isolation for individuals displaying side effects, provide immediate medical attention","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, remote medical consultation, isolation areas","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, clinic staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
